General.Name: Hun Yenilenebilir Enerji Uretim AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Hun Yenilenebilir Enerji Üretim A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the establishment, construction, commissioning, leasing, generation, and sale of electrical energy and/or capacity to transmission and distribution companies in Turkey. It generates electricity through solar, hydroelectric, and biomass power plants. The company's installed capacity includes 6,66,200 kilowatts peak (kWp) of solar power plants; 26,10,000 kWp of hydroelectric power plants; and 10,50,000 kWp of biomass power plants. Hun Yenilenebilir Enerji Üretim A.S. was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Levent Mah. COemert sk., Istanbul, Turkey, 34330
